p: The month-wise rainfall distribution is shown in Fig. 2a. the average rainfall from 2016–2019 was 2.08 mm/day. The highest rainfall was seen in September (6.25 ± 14.49 mm/day) and the lowest in February (0.01 ± 0.11 mm/day). The month-wise prevalence of EKC was negatively correlated with the distribution of rainfall (r = -0.6894), and this correlation was statistically significant (r 2 = 0.47/ P = 0.0131).
